original_text: But a person might do something that he knows to be wrong. He does it because he wants to do it. That person is as bad as someone who insults the Lord. It does not matter whether he is an Israelite or a foreign person. You must make that person separate from all the people.
korean_text: 본토인이든지 타국인이든지 고의로 무엇을 범하면 누구나 여호와를 비방하는 자니 그의 백성 중에서 끊어질 것이라

sentences.original_text: But a person might do something
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 어떤 사람이 무언가를 할 수도 있습니다

sentences.original_text: that he knows to be wrong
He does it because he wants to do it
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것을 하고 싶어서 그렇게 합니다

sentences.original_text: That person is as bad as someone
he is an Israelite or a foreign person
You must make that person separate
